function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Balconies used as smoking places","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion due to close proximity and shared spaces","Mitigation":"Designating smoking areas away from common balconies","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, designated smoking areas","People":"Residential users, neighbors","Owner":"Building management, homeowners' association"},{"Description":"Closure of balconies as a privacy mechanism","Impact":"Loss of communication and social interaction","Mitigation":"Encouraging open balcony designs, community events, social gatherings","Technologies":"Community engagement, event organizing tools","People":"Residential users, neighbors","Owner":"Building management, homeowners' association"},{"Description":"Lack of communication due to closed balconies","Impact":"Isolation and reduced community engagement","Mitigation":"Encouraging open communication, organizing community activities","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, communication tools","People":"Residential users, neighbors","Owner":"Building management, homeowners' association"}]}
